messages.message:
We have observed that some annotations are getting deleted when an annotation set is opened in ML Studio on dogfood. We have not observed this on production or during our most recent UAT tests.

*Warning:* Please avoid using your annotation set on dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com) for the time being!

We will post again when the bug has been fixed.

Update: we have determined that this is caused by issues in the new file service cache, fixes incoming by @Xi Cheng

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1671567858079389

cc @Dominic Fannjiang
yup saw this! will work on making the system test
We have disabled the file cache on dogfood for now, so this issue should no longer occur.
